title: Temperature Sensor
description: Temperature is a critical factor in hydroponics as it affects the growth rate of plants and their nutrient uptake. High water temperature can cause stress to plants and reduce nutrient solubility.

title: Light Detector sensor
description: Light is essential for plant growth in hydroponics as it is the primary source of energy for photosynthesis, and it influences plant morphology and physiology. The intensity, spectrum, and duration of light affect plant growth, development, yield, and quality in hydroponic systems.

title: Water level
description: Light is essential for plant growth in hydroponics as it is the primary source of energy for photosynthesis, and it influences plant morphology and physiology. The intensity, spectrum, and duration of light affect plant growth, development, yield, and quality in hydroponic systems.

title: Humidity sensor
description: Light is essential for plant growth in hydroponics as it is the primary source of energy for photosynthesis, and it influences plant morphology and physiology. The intensity, spectrum, and duration of light affect plant growth, development, yield, and quality in hydroponic systems.

title: Soil Moisture
description: Fertilizers are crucial for providing essential nutrients to plants in hydroponics as there is no soil to supply them. The type, concentration, and application method of fertilizers affect plant growth, yield, and nutrient uptake efficiency in hydroponic systems.

title: NPK Sensor
description: Light is essential for plant growth in hydroponics as it is the primary source of energy for photosynthesis, and it influences plant morphology and physiology. The intensity, spectrum, and duration of light affect plant growth, development, yield, and quality in hydroponic systems.
